report.title: Results overview - taxonomic output
report.description: A report to display the taxon group details on the Results Overview page.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences o JOIN taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values ttlav on ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_id=o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id in (#all_trait_attr_ids#) and ttlav.deleted=false WHERE o.sample_id = #sample_id#

param.name: sample_id
param.description: Sample id to retrieve data for.

param.name: all_trait_attr_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of the taxa taxon list attribute ids that hold species traits.
